name: The Battle of Polytopia
detailed_description:
The Battle of Polytopia is a turn based strategy game. It's a game about ruling the world, fighting evil AI tribes, discovering new lands and mastering new technologies. Pick and choose among different tribes. Wander in the dark cold forests of Barduria, explore the steamy Kickoo jungles or claim the lush field of the Imperius empire.
Each match takes around 30 minutes to complete while still providing a deeply strategic and challenging gameplay. It is intended to be a bite sized alternative to other time consuming 4x strategy games.

The Battle of Polytopia is a successful indie title enjoyed by millions of fans on mobile and tablets and we a currently revamping it to be even better on your desktop.
We plan to add a few Steam exclusive features that does not fit in a mobile game, but we have not decided exactly what yet.
If you have suggestions please let us know! steam@midjiwan.com

We will release when the game feels purrfect, probably around the end of this year. Add it to your wish list to keep updated.

short_description: A bite sized turn based strategy game with low poly graphics. Choose from a bunch of different tribes and lead them to victory by expanding your empire and researching new technologies.
